messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=d2af700ee259 ***

gc: rename %union field name from lint to i

#define lint has special meaning to Bison;
having a field named lint conflicts with that.

R=ken2
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5462044

Hello ken2 (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

subject: code review 5462044: gc: rename %union field name from lint to i
